title: Provided further that the provisions of LOS in case of the redevelopment schemes under the regulation no 33(5),33(7),33(8),,33(15) and 33(20) (A) may be reduced due to planning constraints, minimum of at least 10%shall be maintained
clause_text: Provided further that the provisions of LOS in case of the redevelopment schemes under the regulation no 33(5),33(7),33(8),,33(15) and 33(20) (A) may be reduced due to planning constraints, minimum of at least 10%shall be maintained. Provided further that in case of redevelopment proposal under Regulation No 33(5), the existing area of LOS shall be maintained, if it is more than 10 % of the layout. Minimum area: No such LOS shall measure less than 125 sq. m.
section: LOS in residential and commercial layouts:
